Package Player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player.Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Player​(java.lang.Integer playerId, java.lang.String pokerHand)
    Creates a Player with the specified player identification number and poker hand.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void checkPlayerIdAvailability()
    Checks the takenPlayersIds set to see if the player identification number is already taken.
    java.lang.Integer getPlayerId()
    Gets the player's identification number.
    PokerHand getPokerHand()
    Gets the player's cards wrapped in a PokerHand object.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(java.lang.Integer playerId, java.lang.String pokerHand)
      Creates a Player with the specified player identification number and poker hand.
      Parameters:
      playerId - The player's identification number in integer form.
      pokerHand - The player's cards in a string form.

  • Method Details

    • getPlayerId

      public java.lang.Integer getPlayerId()
      Gets the player's identification number.
      Returns:
      An Integer containing the player's identification number.

    • getPokerHand

      public PokerHand getPokerHand()
      Gets the player's cards wrapped in a PokerHand object.
      Returns:
      An PokerHand object containing the player's cards.

    • checkPlayerIdAvailability

      public void checkPlayerIdAvailability()
      Checks the takenPlayersIds set to see if the player identification number is already taken.
